silver_key.name: Silver Key
silver_key.description: A small, ornate key made of polished silver. It feels cool to the touch.
silver_key.flavor_text: An inscription on the bow reads: 'For the first memory.'

dog_treat.name: A Schmacko
dog_treat.description: A delicious-looking dog treat. It smells of bacon and cheese.
dog_treat.flavor_text: The dog seems to be eyeing this with great interest.
